original: 江夏鍾武人，西晉官員。才德兼備，一直頗受器重。八王之亂時，司馬倫獨掌朝政，逼李重出仕以正名聲，李重在威逼之下，憂慮成疾而病故。
text: Jiangxia Zhongwu, an official of the Western Jin Dynasty. Both talents and virtues have always been highly regarded. During the Rebellion of the Eight Kings, Sima Lun was in charge of the political affairs and forced Li to re-emerge as an official. Li Zhong, under threat, died of anxiety due to illness.
